thread.title_full: Karen Matthews 'planning to flee UK to start new life' | Daily Mail Online

author: Keiligh Baker For Mailonline
title: Karen Matthews 'planning to flee UK to start new life' | Daily Mail Online
text: Karen Matthews 'is planning to flee Britain and start a new life in Spain' after controversial BBC drama puts her back in the spotlight Karen Matthews was attacked last week with a tray of mushy peas in a chip shop She served four years of an eight-year jail term for kidnapping her daughter Shannon Matthews was just aged nine at the time of the kidnap plot in 2008 Matthews staged the kidnap with her accomplice to claim a Â£50,000 ransom Now a friend claims she plans to move to Spain following renewed interest in her Published: 10:08 GMT, 14 February 2017 | Updated: 10:44 GMT, 14 February 2017 45 shares
